description: Phantom processing script written by Vladimir Fonov

inputs.name: File Collection
inputs.description: Defines the collection of files that this pipeline will be operated on. The directory should have two 3d T1W, a T2W, a resting state, and a pd image file inside

inputs.name: Scanner serial
inputs.description: Serial number of the imaging device (leave blank to extract from minc file metadata)

inputs.name: Acquisition date
inputs.description: Date that the images were acquired (leave blank to extract from minc file metadata)

inputs.name: Scanner model
inputs.description: Model of the imaging device (leave blank to extract from minc file metadata)

inputs.name: Scanner software version
inputs.description: Version of software used on the imaging device (leave blank to extract from minc file metadata)

inputs.name: Model File
inputs.description: Make / Model of the imaging device (leave blank to extract from minc file metadata)

inputs.name: Model File
inputs.description: ROI file for image processing (leave blank unless you have your own version of this information)

inputs.name: Mask File
inputs.description: Mask file for image processing (leave blank unless you have your own version of this information)

inputs.name: Bricks File
inputs.description: Lego brick file for image processing (leave blank unless you have your own version of this information)

name: Phantom processing tool with wrapper

output-files.name: Output directory
output-files.description: Directory to place all output files from this pipeline
